body:
Some fixups on the current version:
* I would like to see the "Open â˜­ Sourced" in the intro sequence changed to "Open Source" (drop the D and logo), possibly using a font like http://imgur.com/iFgp3ED.  "Open Sourced" is an action, implying that the code was previously closed source.  Dropping the logo is to simplify life in the near/medium future when we change the main project logo - removing it here means that we only need to replace the title card when that happens.
* The RA shot with the destroyers shows the old GPS icons and should be updated.
* D2K has changed a lot in the last couple of years, so i'm sorry to say that I think it all needs to be updated (the big clips at least - the small montages are probably fine).  Specific issues include the weapon effects, bounties, and sandworm.
* One of the TD clips shows a christmas present crate.  It's a minor point, but IMO that should be cut out to avoid confusion.

I agree with @pchote's feedback. It sucks to redo so much stuff, but I think those are valid concerns.

My two cents: I think it would be beneficial to showcase at least one demo truck explosion in the RA mod. It always makes people happy :)

> My two cents: I think it would be beneficial to showcase at least one demo truck explosion in the RA mod. It always makes people happy :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ak8igonFVDE#t=27m04s
Would be a good demo truck hit + bonus reaction from 5a.

Allright so basically there's just two stages left of footage:

1. Mods
2. Mash-up of intense action shots


**1. Mods**

Planned official mods

- Tiberian Sun - ***aquired**

Might need help getting hold of a functional RA2 mod working on my computer (Win 7) - only need basic skirmish to work.

Significant long standing external mods/projects - on top of my head

- Crystallized Doom - ***aquired**
- Nomad Galaxy - **Nolt on #OpenRA**
- Shattered Paradise - **Nolt on #OpenRA**
- Red Alert 2 - ***supressed**
- Attack Superior - **@GraionDilach** 
- Enigma - (exposed in Mash-up)
- Holloweye's WW1 (exposed in Mash-up)

Modded maps:

Best Map Evur
Murto's Tower Defense and Tetris
TD's medieval maps


**2. Mash-up**

More or less anything goes. Crazy modded maps, competition, reactions, anything that builds up to a finale seconds before the end-title.
RA2 isn't being developed as an official mod, and I expect that advertising it as such would cause us more grief than I would like to deal with.
Then it shouldn't be advertised as such. If ok I'll add it with the other mods. On video time we're only talking split seconds exposure (perhaps mixed) for each of them.  Edited above comment.

Leaked documents from the command bunker. Plans on video montage sequence.

![battleplans](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2715583/24331574/141a2a48-1237-11e7-9bbc-b973570e3c48.jpg)

This is why I struggle working with groups :P
I am Nolt, I can give you access to both of my mods, no problem, btw you could also add Combine's medieval warfare there, he's doing a nice job so far.

A couple more candidates for the mod section:
* http://www.moddb.com/mods/enigma-sc
* @reaperrr's [Tiberan Dawn Xtended](http://ppmforums.com/index.php?f=561) (showing the carribean tileset) and mech mods.

@ABrandau Excellent. I'll look for you the next few days (or share links to soscared123@gmail.com). I already have the medieval mod in mind for some split second exposure as well as other map mods.

@pchote Sure why not. Some of these moddb sections has some great gifs to them that I think I could use.
I'd also list @Holloweye's http://www.moddb.com/mods/openra-the-great-war-wwi-mod WWi mod because atm it's among the biggest RELEASED projects with the most originality.

@GraionDilach Got that in the production line too. Great stuff to show off.

I better post a more comprehensive feature list soon :smile:

**List of video text/titles - checking for good English and considering new text graphic/style _only_-post. Focus on video shots and style in a later post**
- - - - - - -
**Main Style** - Introductions to various video sequences.
**Custom Style** - Mod specific style.
**Commentary Style** - Addressing the viewer.
**From the Heavens** - The 3 main mods' (TD/RA/D2K) titles introduced in video as descending "from above".
**(?)** - I'm open for ideas here regarding text content.
- - - - - - -
1st video sequence (same as linked in OP): https://www.dropbox.com/s/ih2tlyhgx2eyfnv/Produced_177.mp4?dl=0

00:08 - Remade, Modified, Open Sourced - **Main Style** - https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/12773#issuecomment-279481190

_The only alteration that poses a challenge - the complete project file for the intro sequence is lost and would have to be painstakingly rebuilt, at least partially, something I'll hold off 'til last._

00:11 - Red Alert - **Custom Style** - **From the Heavens** 
00:19 - **(?)** - room for text at YAK flyover scene - **Commentary Style**
00:23 - **(?)** - Soviet, Allied, the factions and more - **Commentary Style**
00:30 - **(?)** - Mod Chooser (brand the metal gate?)
00:33 - Dune 2000 - **Custom Style** - **From the Heavens** 
00:35 - **(?)** - room for text at Ordos base scene - **Commentary Style**
00:38 - **(?)** - room for text at Harkonnen base scene - **Commentary Style**
00:57 - Tiberian Dawn - **Custom Style** - **From the Heavens**
01:00 - **(?)** - room for text over multiple TD scenes - **Commentary Style**
- - - - - - -
2nd video sequence (mostly stripped of footage): https://www.dropbox.com/s/hv6y56oqam870so/Produced_220.mp4?dl=0

Text in the 2nd sequence are for the most part presented simply as placeholders for later alteration of graphic/style.

00:03 - Official Mod In Development - **Main Style**
00:04 - Tiberian Sun - **Custom Style**
00:07 - Custom Mods - **Custom Style**
00:08 - Crystallized Doom - **Custom Style**
00:08 - Shattered Paradise - title ingrained in logo
00:09 - Attacque Superior - **Custom Style**
00:10 - Nomad Galaxy - **Custom Style**
00:11 - Modded Maps - **Custom Style**

00:13 - Best! Map! Evur! - **Commentary Style**
00:16 - Enigma Mod - **Custom Style** - **UNDECIDED**
00:17 - Play Co-Op With Friends - **Commentary Style**
00:20 - Big Team Games - **Commentary Style**
00:26 - Play Competitive OpenRA - **Commentary Style**
00:37 - OpenRA - **Main Text Style** - **CUSTOM MAIN TITLE**
- - - - - - -
I'll hand-hold anyone through the info jungle presented here if/when necessary.
It's Attacque, with a c included.

A little over 3 weeks left of the stated deadline.

Specific work that remains:

- Replace outdated footage. **(easy)**
- Add new "commentary" titles to the featured mods segment RA/D2K/TD, tweak current ones. **(easy)**
- Fix transition between 'custom maps' and the last segment ("best map evur" transition) **(easy)** DONE!
- Tweak/add misc. effects. **(easy)** DONE!
- Outtro **(hard)** DONE!

As a bonus I managed to pull together the original intro and can alter it however I like. I've slapped on the new title style to it. Making a decent new outtro will be tough.

Video so far: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dhwelrv2ayaiepw/Produced_19.mp4 (download to view 1080p 30fps). Added a watermark so as to hopefully not have the video distributed too much before its publishing date..

Got some feedback? It's now or never :)

I accidentally uploaded a 60fps high bitrate video making it hard to watch for most users. 

New video, updated link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dhwelrv2ayaiepw/Produced_19.mp4 (download to view 1080p 30fps)

Needs additional text:

Main Titles:

**OPEN SOURCE GAME ENGINE**
**OPENRA** (with 'PEN' being slightly smaller sized than O...RA)

Commentary: 

**PARTAKE IN ALTERNATE HISTORY
THE COLD WAR THAT TURNED HOT
THE SPICE MUST FLOW
THE GAME THAT DEFINED MODERN RTS**

New work-in-progress video: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2tjpkpg71px4ce5/Produced_484.mp4 (download to view 1080p 30fps)

A little more than a week left but it looks like the remaining tasks will be completed in time. Making a list because I like making lists:

Must do:

- [x] Secure against copyright (Westwood trademark) in intro.
- [x] Complete OpenRA end title.
- [x] Credits/outtro.
- [x] Replace outdated footage (D2K Sonic Tank, GPS (naval scene), ++)

Should do:

- [x] Add final commentary/titles by Warman.
- [x] More Image-2-Frames images and effects in before OpenRA end title.

Can do:

- [ ] Further improve 'Custom Maps' sequence to end-montage transition.  
- [x] Tweak ad-infinitum.

Review now or forever hold your peace!

Looks good, but IMO the outdated footage really should be a must do, like I mentioned back in Feb all the headline footage for d2k is visibly outdated - old worm effects, bounties, as well as the blue lasers.
I agree, at least re-shooting D2k is a must, in my opinion.
The old GPS icons is pretty minor by comparison, and could be skipped if time is a problem.

Moved it over to must do. 

I'll work to get the most obvious D2K ones out of the way (mass-bounties, Sonic lazers) but I dare not promise to have _all_ D2K footage replaced. The outdated worm effect in comparison would be lower priority.

Keep in mind this video is more 'flashy' compared to the old one which was more of a 'showcase' trailer that presented more accurately what the game could do. This time more than anything the aim is flash and hype points. At least that's what I'm hoping for.

@pchote Could you do me a favor? Or anyone else for that matter? I wanna have a professional looking 'disclaimer' written in the intro before the use of the Westwood logo. If nothing else, just to underscore the videos' importance and production value (like with the old video) and I think it would fit in all right. Would you have the time to draft up something for me before next Sunday?

I'm tweaking the Westwood logo intro to better signal that OpenRA isn't a Westwood product (EA closed down Westwood Studios in 2003 but still owns the logo) but rather points to Westwood as its' inspiration for OpenRA's official mods.

I wouldn't bet on it, sorry.  If it comes down to it, it would be better to delay this than to release something that we might end up regretting.  It is afterall only a slightly less arbitrary date than any other date.

I thinking actually for some kind of standardized, over-arching statement I could use. It also will depend on the final video product itself but if anyone has at least a pointer to where to look for these sorts of disclaimers that'd be great. This would also be put down with the video description in addition to credits on use of various graphical assets (in that department I have a decent grasp on things). In any case I should be able to present several options this week-end that'll have a few decent "safe" versions - more than anything else I want to ship it no later than the anniversary date.

Text graphics redo wish list:

Reduce dark spots (lighting) on main titles:

'Modded Maps'
'Play Co-Op with friends'
'Big Team Games'
'Play Competetive OpenRA'
'Open Source
Game Engine'

> @pchote 
> One of the TD clips shows a christmas present crate. It's a minor point, but IMO that should be cut out to avoid confusion.

This is still an issue (timestamp 1:11)
That should be easy. Making a list above.
